TopicTitle: My reintroduction post and asking for help with kopernicus mod.

Articles.Content:
OK, let's get this show on the road. I'm OwenM. I used to be owenmaley but my dad made me change it. I have been around since July 17 but haven't made an introduction post yet.

I am a budding mod maker and am having trouble with kopernicus. Post files soon.

Also, a mod which adds some small all-in one rockets.

Thanks for reading,

OwenM

Hi @OwenM! Welcome back to the Forums!

I don't personally have any experience with modifying the Kopernicus mod, but here is a link to the official mod thread. You'll be able to ask for help there.

Nice to see that you are rejoining our ranks!

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/k6f3a9bky48g7l8/AAD9MLXra7AltGLpXGlNzwFma?dl=0

My planet pack. as soon as I f12 to it All hell gets loose.

Greetings, Owen, it's always good to see another Aussie here.

While I know nothing about modding or kopernicus you might want to try posting your question here - I'm sure you'll get a fast reply:
